document.docAuthor: Pacheco-Chaves, Bernald, Cordeiro, Isabelle Da Rocha Silva, Moreira, Felipe Ferraz Figueiredo & Springer, Monika
document.masterDocTitle: The water striders (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) of Costa Rica: new species, checklist, and new records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The water striders (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) of Costa Rica: new species, checklist, and new records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Previously reported from northwestern
Mexico
and Puerto Rico to Costa Rica ( Guanacaste , Alajuela , and San José provinces) (Champion 1898; Torre-Bueno 1906 ; Wolcott 1924 , 1936 ; Drake & Harris 1928c , 1934 , 1938 ; Kuitert 1942 ; Drake & Maldonado-Capriles 1954 ; Maier 1977 ; Maes 1989 ; Bass 1993 ; Morales & Molano 2009 ;
Damgaard et al. 2014
), being herein recorded for the first time from Puntarenas Province . In Costa Rica ,
T. quadrilineatus
is found in the same type of small forest puddles along the Atlantic and Pacific slopes as is
T. opacus
, also up to 1,200 m a.s.l.
